attributes.action: Please have English People Stop Attacking Chechs in Nebraska
attributes.additional_details: I had a knowing program and lifestyle program that Princess Diana was interested in in the 80s in Iowa and Nebraska, USA.  English people moved from Minnesota and all other states to chase me down and try to trade my program for an Old English lines to traitor America for England for a potential famous girl.  They put me in a time loop and attacked me as a representative of America to try to take over America.  Please make them stop!!!  Please have some dignity England!!  It was my right to go Ivy League and have the life I worked for!!!
